summary: This is a first time mod for me, so please be gentle. It\'s a large dungeon with some books and keys for clues. No quest tied in yet, but lots of goodies and baddies!!
descriptionHtml:
The Dragon Trials Temple simply appears out of nowhere; what could it be? As the Dragon Born you surely must investigate? Of course upon entering you are locked inside and must now use the only clues left behind to make your way through the Dragon Trials Temple. Remember to look for the books and keys and read the books too! Lots of evil monsters and other nasty things await inside...can you best all 4 trials?

The Dungeon is located just west of Riverwood across the river. There is a screenshot of the map location on the images section.

Download the esp file, load and enjoy!
author: Judas622
